languages.text: Сервиторы, обслуживающие складочные отсеки, пришли в неистовство и начали нападать на пустотников. Выжившие свидетели твердят, что видели, как злокозненная варп-тварь вселилась в один из автоматонов — нужно найти способ избавиться от нее!

Servitors assigned to the storage bays have gone berserk and are attacking voidsmen. Survivors are claiming to have seen some pernicious warp beast possessing one of the automatons — it must be expelled one way or another!
languages.original_text: Сервиторы, обслуживающие складочные отсеки, пришли в неистовство и начали нападать на пустотников. Выжившие свидетели твердят, что видели, как злокозненная варп-тварь вселилась в один из автоматонов — нужно найти способ избавиться от нее!

traits.locale_text: Servitors assigned to the storage bays have gone berserk and are attacking voidborn. Survivors are claiming to have seen some pernicious warp beast possessing one of the automatons — it must be expelled one way or another!

Servitors assigned to the storage bays have gone berserk and are attacking voidborn. Survivors are claiming to have seen some pernicious warp beast possessing one of the automatons — it must be expelled one way or another!

Servitors assigned to the storage bays have gone berserk and are attacking voidsmen. Survivors are claiming to have seen some pernicious warp beast possessing one of the automatons — it must be expelled one way or another!

Servitors assigned to the storage bays have gone berserk and are attacking voidsmen. Survivors are claiming to have seen some pernicious warp beast possessing one of the automatons — it must be expelled one way or another!

languages.text: 储藏甲板的机仆突然失控，开始袭击船员。幸存者声称，他们看到某种邪恶的亚空间凶兽附身在了其中一个机仆身上。必须不惜代价把它驱逐出去！
languages.original_text: Servitors assigned to the storage bays have gone berserk and are attacking voidsmen. Survivors are claiming to have seen some pernicious warp beast possessing one of the automatons — it must be expelled one way or another!

traits.locale_text: 储藏甲板的奴工突然失控，开始袭击船员。幸存者声称，他们看到某种邪恶的亚空间凶兽附身在了其中一个奴工身上。必须不惜代价把它驱逐出去！

languages.text: Los servidores asignados a las bodegas de carga se han vuelto locos y están atacando a los soldados del vacío. Los supervivientes afirman haber visto a una perniciosa bestia de la disformidad poseer a uno de los autómatas. ¡Debe ser eliminada sea como sea!
languages.original_text: Servitors assigned to the storage bays have gone berserk and are attacking voidsmen. Survivors are claiming to have seen some pernicious warp beast possessing one of the automatons — it must be expelled one way or another!

traits.locale_text: Los servidores asignados a las bodegas de carga se han vuelto locos y están atacando a los soldados del vacío. Los supervivientes afirman haber visto a una perniciosa bestia de la disformidad poseer a uno de los autómatas. ¡Debe ser eliminada sea como sea!

languages.text: 倉庫ベイに配属中のサーヴィターが暴走して、ヴォイズマンを襲っている。生き残った者は、1体のオートマトンに取り憑いた悪しき<歪み>の獣を見たと訴えている…何とかして排除しなければ！
languages.original_text: Servitors assigned to the storage bays have gone berserk and are attacking voidsmen. Survivors are claiming to have seen some pernicious warp beast possessing one of the automatons — it must be expelled one way or another!

traits.locale_text: 倉庫ベイに配属中のサーヴィターが暴走して、ヴォイズマンを襲っている。生き残った者は、1体のオートマトンに取り憑いた悪しき<歪み>の獣を見たと訴えている…何とかして排除しなければ！

languages.text: Les servitors affectés aux baies de stockage sont pris de folie meurtrière et attaquent les cosmomarins. Les survivants jurent avoir vu une sinistre monstruosité du Warp prendre possession de l'un d'eux, il faut l'expulser d'une manière ou d'une autre !
languages.original_text: Servitors assigned to the storage bays have gone berserk and are attacking voidsmen. Survivors are claiming to have seen some pernicious warp beast possessing one of the automatons — it must be expelled one way or another!

traits.locale_text: Les servitors affectés aux baies de stockage sont pris de folie meurtrière et attaquent les cosmomarins. Les survivants jurent avoir vu une sinistre monstruosité du Warp prendre possession de l'un d'eux, il faut l'expulser d'une manière ou d'une autre !

languages.text: Servitoren, die den Lagerbuchten zugewiesen sind, laufen Amok und greifen Raumfahrer an. Die Überlebenden berichten von einem gefährlichen Warpmonster, das Besitz von einem der Automaten ergriffen hat — es muss vertrieben werden, wie auch immer!
languages.original_text: Servitors assigned to the storage bays have gone berserk and are attacking voidsmen. Survivors are claiming to have seen some pernicious warp beast possessing one of the automatons — it must be expelled one way or another!

traits.locale_text: Servitoren, die den Lagerbuchten zugewiesen sind, laufen Amok und greifen Raumfahrer an. Die Überlebenden berichten von einem gefährlichen Warpmonster, das Besitz von einem der Automaten ergriffen hat — es muss vertrieben werden, wie auch immer!

languages.text: Depo bölmelerine atanan hizmetkârlar çılgına döndü, uçsuz erlerine saldırıyorlar. Hayatta kalanlar; otomatonlardan birine musallat olmuş, sinsi bir öteboyut yaratığı gördüklerini iddia ediyor. Bu varlık bir şekilde ortadan kaldırılmalı!
languages.original_text: Servitors assigned to the storage bays have gone berserk and are attacking voidsmen. Survivors are claiming to have seen some pernicious warp beast possessing one of the automatons — it must be expelled one way or another!
